_sText:
************************************************************To enjoy this map to its full extent do the following

1. Open the console and type MP_LIMITTEAMS (anything higher than 30 will do)
2. Type MP_AUTOTEAMBALANCE 0

And if you like to play with bots make the bots join the terrorist team
************************************************************
This map is about one thing for the counter terrorists SLAUGHTERING TERRORISTS. But for the terrorists its a struggle for their survival they could use brute force speed or team tactics. IMMENSE FUN!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

ORBITAL STUDIO!!!!
